attributes.action: Scrap parking charges at NHS hospitals for students and NHS staff.
attributes.additional_details: Local NHS trusts are charging from £20 per month depending on the person's rate of pay, students are being asked to pay £15 per month when working voluntary at trusts despite being on a low income and are no longer receiving bursaries.
attributes.background: I do think that NHS staff are treated unfairly, especially when car parking charges are taken from their wages every month. Most staff work long hours they are overworked and already underpaid,  so I can't understand why money has to be deducted every month for money that they have worked hard for?
